website_summaries.verdict: Highly useful case for anyone looking for included keyboard to turn tablet into a valuable productivity accessory.
pros: Easy to pair sleek keyboard and case, automatically connects after initial setup
Bluetooth keyboard can be paired with other devices
Protective magnetic folding case fits iPad Pro 9.7"
cons: Keyboard adds extra bulk onto case

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Alpatronix- KX130 Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I swore off keyboards for my iPad Air after going through a few keyboards- the experience was not satisfactory. With some hesitation, I tried the Alpatronix KX130 keyboard. The keyboard itself is quite solid, with large keys. Operating it is intuitive and the user manual is straightforward and helpful. Connecting to bluetooth was quick and easy and the battery lasts a long time for a portable. My iPad slipped into (and out of) the keyboard case easily. The Keyboard case itself was only adequate at keeping the keyboard in different orientations, frequently slipping closed. Overall, a great product that is durable and easy to use. Worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth the Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The iPad Air fits perfectly into the slot and the keyboard is also really nice to type on. I have only had to charge the keyboard once and almost a month later it's still more than halfway charged. The bluetooth automatically connects to the iPad and there is no lag when I type. The keyboard base is magnetically attached to the bottom, so one can easily take it off if they won't be typing, which then offers you two different placements for putting your iPad. The flap that closes the case is also magnetic and easily snaps close. Overall, it has a sturdy feel to it and is nicely designed for work or school use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little case
customer_reviews.text: This case has been perfect for all our needs. The keyboard feels very small when you first use it but it becomes normal as time goes on. The case is very sturdy and the keyboard is easily removable when needed. It runs off blue tooth and we have had no problems with connection.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the keyboard for about five days and am so happy I thought I’d write the review right away. This means I can’t judge durability although my sense is this is a robust product that will hold up. They have thought about everything. The magnetic connection between keyboard and iPad is easy and makes an immediate functional connection. Keyboard charges while connected so no worries about having to charge yet another device each evening. The keyboard case protects the back and front of the IPad but is slim and sleek. I’m very happy with the design and function of this keyboard. I’d buy it again. Glad I researched and didn’t settle for the Apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Price ....Good quality....Good customer service with a two year warranty...
customer_reviews.text: I admit I usually over analyze many if not all off my purchases on Amazon. I read just about every review. (Except for three star reviews which for me are fence reviews.) Full transparency here the first keyboard I ordered didn’t work because it didn’t charge. I did however decide that I would return the defective one and try again. Not normally my M.O. , but I really liked the look of the case and the quality of the keyboard. In addition to that Alpatronix offered a two year warranty on the device. That combination made the purchase an simple decision. I have been typing away for two weeks now. Happy satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: WDESTEF

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard is great, easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is great, easy to connect and use. iPad and keyboard fit nicely in the case together and are held secure with magnets. However, none of the access hole in the case lineup properly with the iPad making it impossible to plug in the lightening cable to charge.the cut out for the home key covers part of the key making it impossible to use fingerprint access. The groves in the case are not deep enough to hold the cover in an up, open position so the iPad keeps slipping. Very awkward to try and prop the screen up. I'll use the keyboard but with another case. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: W Bryant Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be easier to use and set up- the iPad linked to it instantly and one really nice feature is that you can switch off the keyboard ...
customer_reviews.text: These guys just can't miss! Although there's no shortage of choices when looking at protective cases for an iPad, I was leaning toward the Alpatronix model due to my overwhelming satisfaction with other products of theirs that I use. Well, this is another winner. Couldn't be easier to use and set up- the iPad linked to it instantly and one really nice feature is that you can switch off the keyboard if you don't want to use it. You can also totally remove it (it's held magnetically, I think) and just use the case for protection. You have clear access to all the iPad's buttons and switches so don't worry about that. Stop right now and get this case!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard case for the new 9.7 iPad. When set up for typing on the keyboard, the viewing angle for the screen is about right, and the keyboard works well. This configuration makes it easy to get work done in a car or plane. Note that you can't flip the upper portion from landscape to portrait, which is a small annoyance. The case also works well when using without the keyboard, in portrait orientation. The resulting thickness when folding the cover back over on itself is comfortable for extended holding.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Christianson

customer_reviews.title: The last keyboard/case that I had worked great but caused my iPad screen to crack
customer_reviews.text: The last keyboard/case that I had worked great but caused my iPad screen to crack. Plus it lasted only a year before it broke. This keyboard/case does a much better job of protecting my iPad; however, the keyboard is off to the point that the space key is too far to the left and I find myself trying to compensate, which causes me to strike wrong keys. Further, the colon/semi-colon and question mark/slash keys are on the bottom row, which only adds to the confusion of using this keyboard. I'm having to relearn how to use the keyboard and it ain't fun, bigly!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: KEYBOARD WORKED ONCE.
customer_reviews.text: It bundles the product nicely, and it's convenient to have a keyboard, but the keyboard only worked one time. It won't charge anymore. I kept thinking it was because I left it on after charging, but I tested it, and I charged it for an hour and it still was dead, charged it all night, still dead. Super frustrating that I wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very useful tool for the 9
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful tool for the 9.7 iPads. Setup was extremely easy. There are very clear instructions, however you can probably figure it out how to set this up with out them. The keys have a good feel and nice feedback without a lot of noice. I hate the sound of clickety clack. Due to the size of the iPad, the keyboard is small and will take getting used to. When you are using the keyboard the iPad is stable and does not slip. The keyboard does add bulk to the iPad, but it is not overly heavy. Over all, I am happy with the keyboard case.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kichline

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad keyboard! Alpatronix KX130
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard! I bought this because I am using my iPad more and more for work when a PC is not required. I searched around and this keybard met my requirements. I was not disappointed. From unpacking to typing was about one minute! The case is also part of the keyboard and all was well put together with no blemishes or defects. It comes with a mini-usb charging cable that will plug into any USB block charger or an available USB jack on your PC or hub. Paperwork inside the package allowed an option to increase the warranty to two years! All-in-all, this is a great option if you need a keyboard on your iPad, the Alpatronix KX130.
customer_reviews.author: MMcallister00

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with this case!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this case! The feel of the material is very nice. It charges quickly, and holds a charge extremely well. The feel of the keys when typing is solid and comfortable. The ipad slips in easily and is held securely. My favorite feature is that the keyboard is secured in the case magnetically for easy removal or repositioning. I like to pull the keyboard forward to the edge of the case and rest the ipad behind it. This gives me the perfect, glare free, viewing angle for typing. I have tried a lot of keyboard cases. This one is far and away the best. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Very clunky bulky. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it would not accept a charge. Even if it had, it’s unlikely I would have kept it because it is so crude and bulky. Your IPad is inserted into a clumsy frame and then an even clumsier vecro tab is wrapped around and inserted. Some of the buttons on the IPad are then difficult if not impossible to access. When open and in use it takes up just too much room and is too thick and awkward when closed.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Lies

customer_reviews.title: The home button is covered slightly which is annoying. The rest seems fine although it doesn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new IPad Pro and this was suppose to fit it. The home button is covered slightly which is annoying.The rest seems fine although it doesn't fit "snug".What bothers me the most is I am a "home row" kind of typer and these buttons drive me crazy. Slightly off from other keyboards and I've had an Ipad with a keyboard before with no problem. I'm not sure I'll be able to work with this. Making too many typing mistakes and work is taking too long. One other thing is my thin, light new 1lb Ipad Pro now weighs 2lb 4.2oz. Was hoping to keep it lighter for travel.That I need to investigate further.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Bierle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard and case combo for a couple of months now. It seems to be made fairly well, and is holding up great. The magnets could stand to be a bit stronger, as the case opens easier than I like, since I travel a lot with it, but they hold ok... The battery for the keyboard seems to keep a good charge. The all around protectiveness of the case is very nice... I have a lot of accidental drops that occur. All in all, the case is what I have come to expect from Alpatronix... Great quality, and design.
customer_reviews.author: chaos

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I had an Aduro keyboard and case that seems also identical to this Alpatronix keyboard and case. Like the Aduro, it is very easy to type. The Bluetooth connectivity is much better with the Alpatronix keyboard, and in an improvement from the Aduro keyboard (possibly just an updated model) the Apple Pencil can be recharged without having to remove the iPad Pro from the case. I store my Apple Pencil using an elastic band as shown in the photos below. My only concern is how long the lithium ion polymer battery will last beyond the two year warranty. I believe that was the reason that my Aduro keypad stopped connecting via Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMtnBill

customer_reviews.title: Well liked
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these. These were ordered for other people. They seem to like them. No complaints. Then I bought one for myself. I like the flexibility of the keyboard -- the ability to move it off the case onto my lap or table. The case appears to be well made and sturdy. The iPad fits securely into the case and locks in with a Velcro strap. I'm very pleased with the keyboard case so far. I bought this specific keyboard case to pair with my iPad to be able to travel around the house as well as away from home so I didn't have to bring my laptop. It is much more convenient than the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: RC Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Pink and Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I like the response of the keys for something compact, it needs very little getting used to... the question mark is on a new key, but other than that I think its great! It connects well to the iPad with bluetooth. Perhaps a little more detail is needed in showing customers various ways to hold up the iPad while using the keyboard? I dunno. I figured out a way to use it just fine on my lap so I’m satisfied. The entire ensemble makes the iPad heavier, and not as compacted, but if this combination is your only source of computing while traveling, than it should be no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended to all who have an ipad pro 9
customer_reviews.text: the item KX130 fits my ipad pro 9.7, This product looks expensive but affordable. Its worth it. Recommended to all who have an ipad pro 9.7 with limited budget. This cover and keyboard also protects your ipad pro 9.7. I like it... This is my second purchase of the cover. The first one I bought from other supplier does not hold the ipad upright anymore after 3 months of use. My new KX130 , looks like with quality and has a 2 years of warranty. Just register your item once you got it....
customer_reviews.author: wexy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and as advertised. I like the ability to use a keyboard keeping in mind the functions are somewhat limited since the iPad is not a full blown computer. There is a learning curve to using the keyboard but it's very functional. Makes it much easier to answer lengthy emails. I had need to contact customer support via chat and was very helpful and professional. The company seems like they want to do the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Harold L.  Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Awkward and bulky. Difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Is there such a thing a too much keyboard? Yes. Yes, there is. This albatross has way too much leather that you have to keep folding out of the way. The upright angle is too sharp, and the display sits right on top of the keys. It is also hard to reach the volume buttons on the iPad. I will be returning this for my former brand of keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: PME

customer_reviews.title: Really nifty addition to an iPad
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing – has turned my iPad into a real workhorse while providing good looks and protection. If I could fault it, I'd say the magnets for the keyboard could be stronger to prevent it from sliding when the iPad is propped up. But this didn't stop me from buying a second one for my wife. Also, Alpatronix customer service was wonderful when I had to replace my 2 year old keyboard because it no longer would make a Bluetooth connection. Just pay attention when ordering: there are different versions of the keyboard case for different iterations of the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: headsmd

customer_reviews.title: thank you for having a on/off Switch!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second keyboard, the first I gave to a fellow Assistive Technology Trainer for the purpose of demonstrating the product to her students. Why I have repurchased your product is the following; quality, ease of pairing and having a specific on/off switch. We teach blind and visualy impaired people and having a switch is vital, other models have a button you press and watch for a light to indicate it is on/off. For someone with no vision or low vision that is not useable. Please continue making keyboards with this feature. And thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: I also love the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt of the leather cover and keyboard, I found a cover which I feel will supply my iPad with the support desired to keep it safe if it should happen to fall or knocked over. I also love the keyboard. It makes typing and input of other information onto my iPad very easy. I look forward to many days of enjoyment using this cover and keyboard with my iPad. I would recommend this item to anyone who is looking for a good system to cover their iPad which comes with a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Virdia Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Received this product quickly and in perfect condition. Total setup time from out of package ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this product quickly and in perfect condition. Total setup time from out of package to setup, including bluetooth connection to writing this review less than 1 minute. Fits my Ipad Air perferfectly and I love the fact the keyboard easliy snaps out of the case, in case I don't want to carry it. Also must mention the bluetooth connected within seconds to my Iphone as well, in case i wanted to use with the phone. The keyboard can be used separate from case and the Ipad can be propped up in vertical rather than default landscape view. Looks attractive, well made, adaptable, and easliy installed and operational -- a great but and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Buying this case was a huge mistake. The keyboard is small, has a weird feel under the fingers, and is hard to use; I make constant typos with it, and I'm a good typist. It doesn't stay charged for long. It's very hard to plug in the charger for the iPad, and hard to get the tablet in and out of the case. I'm looking to replace it with something that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboad
customer_reviews.text: I have two different keyboards for my IPad. Both of hem are ok, but my biggest problem has been that I type too fast and they lag. I pulled this one out of the box today and it instantly connected to my IPad. It fit perfectly and didn't block the camera. And I am a fast Tyler. I opened up a google document and this keyboard kept up with me. It felt like an actual desk top keyboard. This is a great product. Especially if you are looking for a quality keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Turns Ipad into a mini laptop.
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth keyboard arrived quickly from Amazon. The plug in the keyboard to insert charger in seemed a little loose but still charged 100%. It was very easy to set up the bluetooth and connect to the Ipad. I have been using the keyboard all weekend and it is working great on the same charge. It turns your Ipad into a mini laptop which is awesome when you are typing a lot on it. I would defnitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I like that the keyboard is magnetic and easy to remove if needed. They battery holds up for a long time, but the Ipad sits a little awkward above the keyboard. It takes a minute to situate it properly but once it is secure, you have no issues. I also wish that the keyboard would sit magnetically on both sides of the cover. That way if you want to move the ipad to an upright position, they keyboard can be set where it is not in the way Overall a good product. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Foster

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard used this to connect an Ipad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no problem at all connecting, can't say how the battery life is yet, doesn't come with a charger but does come with a charging cord Update: TERRIBLE, TERRIBLE, did I say TERRIBLE? Battery life? There is none. This keyboard works when plugged in, period.
customer_reviews.author: JWW

customer_reviews.title: Cute color.  Terrible keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have to charge the keyboard every 2 days. Cute case but not a reliable keyboard. Very disappointed Update: after posting my review, Apatronix contacted me immediately. What an awesome company with GREAT customer service. They replaced my keyboard, sent a label to send the defective one back, and now I am a happy happy customer! I will definitely buy from Apaptronix again! Thank you for being so helpful. I have been using my new keyboard for 3 weeks now and it has not needed a charge! Wish I could give them 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Holly R. Kort

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A very good keyboard and case for the iPad air. I used to have a Zagg, which is certainly more sleek, but the Zagg keyboard was TERRIBLE for duplicating keystrokes constantly. It also broke its hinge about a year in, so no more for me. This keyboard has a nice tight feel, and I've not had a single duplicate stroke. 4-stars only because it's quite a bit bulkier than I'm used to, but I'll get used to it. Overall, I'm very pleased and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Case Needs Work
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard case is very good. Protects iPad well. My only issue is that the magnets don't hold keyboard to case very well. If there was elastic or stronger magnets or something I would give this a 5 star rating. I am changing my review. I have had this keyboard for 5 months and some of the keys are not working properly. In order to change to an uppercase I have to hold down shift key hard. Also, the ridge that holds the IPad upright when using it is not sufficient. It needs a larger ridge so the IPad doesn't slide down over the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Superb Portfolio Case Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bluetooth Keyboard overall...how so? 1. It connects with devices, be it the iPad or iPhone or Android device, every time and very quickly. Not all bluetooth devices do this consistently. 2. iPad fits very snug into case. 3. The case color is really unique (we love it) and the leather is a nice quality and also pretty protective. 4. The detach-ability of the keyboard from the portfolio body adds a great convenient feature. 5. Keyboard keys are responsive with good spring. That's all folks!
customer_reviews.author: WsK

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Keyboard Case!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard/leather case is perfect for me! The material of the case is very sturdy and holds the ipad up very well when using with the keyboard. The keyboard lasts a long time without needing charging and is very easy to turn on and off and pair with the ipad. THe keyboard also pops out of the case easily by magnet in order to charge without needing the entire case to be by the charger. I would highly recommend this case to anyone looking for a case with keyboard! It is a great price and works PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Creech

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price! Deliberate design.
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I have an iPad Air 2. The case fits the ipad nicely. The leather material seems durable. Pairing the bluetooth keyboard was super simple. Took about 5 seconds and I was typing. It all folds together into a nice package and easy to carry along. About 1" thick when folded up. Much like carrying a book. I like how the case extends below the keyboard and serves as a 'pad' to rest your wrists on when typing. Nice design touch. Keyboard is removable and held in place with magnets. Using a keyboard with the iPad is so much better than trying to type long emails or documents with the on-screen keyboard. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DJV

customer_reviews.title: Bright Pink But Big On Features
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for your iPad with a little flair. Overall I am very happy with the product. The keys have enough feedback for me so that I can type none stop and not feel as though I would have mistakes occurring. The pink is Very pink. Not really my favorite pink but everything else about the Case gets the job done. It offers great protection and I would not be worried about it being in my backpack. It is on the thick side but that is the price you pay for a connected keyboard. I had no issues getting the Bluetooth paired up and it seems to last forever. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard for iPad
customer_reviews.text: This iPad case with removable keyboard was pretty clunky to use. There was no way to snap keyboard in place so it wouldn't stay in one place. True, it can be moved/used away from case but we did not use that feature much at all. Then the batter died after a year or so - had to replace it but not in kind.
customer_reviews.author: Lastamba

customer_reviews.title: This made me love my IPad Air 2 even more!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the quality of this case and keyboard. I had it up and running in record time and just love the protection it provides as well as the pink color! I am already considering ordering another for another Ipad. The price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: guitarlover

customer_reviews.title: BULKY case. Nice keyboard can carry separately - not attached to case.
customer_reviews.text: First Day impression (I've had it in use less than 5 hours) For $31 bucks cannot complain. Case is rather bulky. iPad Air becomes iPad Brick, BUT keyboard is nice quality, works well. Keyboard isn't attached as part of the case front flap but is free-floating / it's own device that is wrapped within the bulky case when it is closed. I can even carry and use the keyboard separately in my backpack while still using my slimmer (but 4 years old) Belkin case. (initial thoughts, not a plan)
customer_reviews.author: Rick Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my second gen iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: If you want a great keyboard case to both protect your iPad, and to add physical keyboard this is the case for you. It turns your iPad into a laptop setup with touch screen capabilities. Having a keyboard is crucial whether you're typing an email or doing Excel on you iPad. After charging the keyboard you'll be amazed at how long the keyboard can be used before it needs to be charged again.
customer_reviews.author: Purpchin65

customer_reviews.title: Nice case. Slightly bulkier than the one I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Slightly bulkier than the one I had before, but likely offers more protection. The flap gets a bit in the way of using the keyboard. Keyboard layout slightly different than larger keyboard. Takes some getting used to. And, keyboard is removable. Would be nice if there were more fixed positions for screen. Overall, case and keyboard both work very well. Fast bluetooth connection too.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Tindell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bluetooth keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is very comfortable to type with. You actually want to type on it, if that makes any sense. Some keyboards tire out your fingers/wrist. This one certainly does not. The form factor and aesthetics is fantastic. It looks very professional to carry around. Functionality-wise, it connects with devices, be it the iPad or iPhone or Android device, every time and very quickly. Not all bluetooth devices do this consistently. It's an excellent keyboard that is very competitively priced.
customer_reviews.author: WsK

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Case is very sturdy and provides good protection for the iPad, The removable, bluetooth keyboard is extremely convenient and useful. Cons: The case does not provide a very good stand. The slightest touch will cause the iPad to slip/slide out of position. The magnets that hold the keyboard in place are very weak allowing it to slip out of place occasionally.. Not as good, in my opinion, as the Logitech case I had previously, but not as expensive either. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: W Denton

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up - small keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the keyboard. It paired quickly and easily with my iPad and seems to be holding a charge very well. It IS a small keyboard. I can touch type, but I make significantly more errors with this keypad than with the keyboard on my laptop. I have to look at the keyboard in order to reduce my mistakes. I assume I will get better over time. I will still enjoy traveling with smaller keyboard and iPad than with laptop.
customer_reviews.author: SanAnnNan

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did warranty replacement twice on this model. First one would not charge on arrival. Replacement charged couple times. Now will not charge any longer. Suspect batteries defective. Amazon will no longer replace. They say because of same issue as first one, not charging. Worked well when it charges. Mfg should replace these or refund cost paid. Wish I could return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: 66 Chevy

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It expands the functionality of the iPad so much by making it easy to type. The look is great as well--it folds up into a neat little leather case that looks very sleek and professional. Just keep in mind that some keys are smooshed down into the wrong row (I don't see how this could have been avoided taking the size of the iPad into account), so it takes some getting used to. The ? is down next to the space bar, for instance. I adjusted after a few hours of typing, though, and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Case offers good value, quality and function.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased keyboard case. Love the color and qulaity of the case. Feel the case will hold up well. All buttons and charging ports are easily accessable. It was easy to setup and connect to my Ipad. The keyboard may be small if you have large hands. The case works perfectly when sitting at a table. It is less stable if using on your lap falling frequently. Also, the keyboard does not stay attached to case as he magnets are not strong enough to hold it in place. Still, it is a fabulous case for the money and versitility if offeres. Overall very good qaulity, function, and value. Would recommned.
customer_reviews.author: m-sykes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality case for those who use a keyboard a lot on their iPad
customer_reviews.text: The Keyboard + Leather Case is good quality and has a nice battery life. The case could withstand it being dropped and the keyboard was nice to type on. The only downside to the product was when you weren't using the keyboard the case was rather large and awkward to have on the ipad. We don't do a lot of typing on our ipad, so there were several times we took off the keyboard to be able to fold the case back and it was just more bulky that I would have liked for it to be. But if you are needing a case that has a good functional keyboard then this product would be great for you.
customer_reviews.author: ajrrn

customer_reviews.title: Great Case for iPad Air 2
customer_reviews.text: I have had this iPad case for my iPad Air 2 for about four weeks. I really like it. It protects my iPad really well and it is functional. The holes line up pretty well for the camera, power and speakers. The hole for the power cable is slightly off, but usable. I really like that you can remove the keyboard, but it can also come out of the case or move when you don't want it to. This doesn't happen often and for the most part it works really well.While it's not absolutely perfect, I don't think I could find a case I like better than this one. For that reason, I'm giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have had so many cases with hinges that fail after a few months. Figured this one didn't have hinges so nothing to break. Don't really like it. Keyboard isn't standard so I have trouble using it. The ipad tends to tip over if I press on the screne too hard. But again, at least there isn't a hinge, tried 3 Zagg ones, they need to come up with better hinge.
customer_reviews.author: read books

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints at all. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price. Very good qaulity exspecially for what I paid. It replaced an older defective Keyboard port folio. This one comes with detachable keyboard and I like that. The over all size of the new portfolio keyboard case is a little larger then my old one. I replace the carrying case. I found a perfect carrying case for the new one. I am very satisfied with my purchase. I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard is fantastic, I did not expect it to work as ...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is fantastic, I did not expect it to work as good as it does! I can take it off and set it aside if I don't need to use it, and Ive had it approximately 2 weeks, give or take, and I have only charged it once. I turn it off when I'm not using it, but I'm still impressed with the battery life. Plus, I love the magnetic hold it has with the case. I can pick it up without having to hold it in place and it stays put! This is a must for my IPad, my only regret is that I didn't get one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: StewMeat

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks good
customer_reviews.text: After a bit of a challenge getting the keyboard to link with the blue tooth, the keyboard is working well. I am still experimenting as to whether it is worth turning off the keyboard during non use or whether I should just leave it on all the time and if the latter how long the charge will last. I like the compact, good looking and secure appearance. I am still getting use to the slightly smaller keys and the difference location of some of the keys, but that will work out in time.
customer_reviews.author: John Holl

customer_reviews.title: This case works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this ipad case for over a week now. The initial setup with connecting the keyboard was easy. Being able to use a keyboard with the ipad certainly makes typing email etc much easier. The case is solid and protects the ipad very well. It looks good. The battery on the keyboard also last a long time. We are very glad with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice case. Compared to some of the more costly folio cases, I would prefer this one. very durable and easy to setup. I have added a privacy filter to my iPad and with this case it makes working on planes easier. I took one star off for not having a backlit keyboard, but I knew that before hand.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jaime

customer_reviews.title: little disappointed, 1st the case is bulky
customer_reviews.text: little disappointed, 1st the case is bulky, and I don't like the way it stands the ipad up when open, and the lid or flap of the case seems to always be in my way, the position of my ipad makes using the keyboard at the top difficult, the keyboard seems functional but would much rather have had a case for the ipad and a slim one for the keyboard, that way use what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Gone

customer_reviews.title: Solid but a little 'clunky' and openings for recharging not properly aligned
customer_reviews.text: Since the Logitech folio, which is the best designed keyboard folio, has twice either broken its tabs (and led to my ipad glass cracking) and once even the keyboard malfunctioned (started typing two random leters as I typed) I bought the Alpatronix, which is the highest rated. Alas, though it keeps the ipad secure, the lower flap gets in the way if you use the ipad on your lap, and when i tried to charge the iPAD, I couldn't get it to connect, because the opening just isn't in the right place to make a connection (tried it OFTEN.) Haven't had it long so don't know about reliability etc. Am still keeping it as back up for my new Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: Rajika

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quickly and Clunky To Use
customer_reviews.text: Had the keyboard for a short time - the l-key went bad - with minimal use. Other features worthy of a 1-star review. Screen is hard to hold in place and constantly needs pushing back into place (even though the holding straps are as tight as possible. Keyboard is not held into the case - it can fall out if you tip the case the wrong way while open. Reading ebooks is a pain as you have to double-fold the cover behind the ipad itself (then you have one thick reading package.) Keyboard <enter> key is smaller than competitive units. Returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Green

customer_reviews.title: I was really hoping to love this. However
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this. However, thought the keyboard works well- which is the part I thought might not work, the fit of the case is not great. It covers the bottom of the ipad such that it is hard to scroll up from the bottom and covers the camera such that pat of the view is obstructed and the cover has to be loosened and fiddled with in order to take a picture. It seems that it would have been easy to make the whole slightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: herz

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the case and is a big improvement over the Logitech keyboard. I had two Logitech keyboards which both broke at the plastic holding tabs so changed to this one. This one will hold the iPad without breaking over time and is an attractive cover although a little bulky compared to the Logitech. The reason for the the four stars is it does have difficulty staying in place as it works on friction and not the magnetic strip like the Logitech and the folding covers plus is bulkier so a little more cumbersome to carry around. After having two prior Logitech keyboards I am still getting used to the different keyboard layout.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Happy: ) it was super easy to pair
customer_reviews.text: Happy :) it was super easy to pair. I was confused by flap how to stand it but called cs and very helpful. Love the color and this is so easy as I type with iPad on table kB on lap. They even donate $1 to charity for review. This is waaaay better than the lousy Logitech that fell apart and also the hard card one that got great reviews that wouldn’t pair and no cs. Great deal
customer_reviews.author: SSpring

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: My son need a case with keyboard for school. This worked about a week and now we can’t even charge the keyboard because the charging port is so loose the charger won’t stay in. And can’t blame my son as he usually forgot to take it out of his backpack to charge his iPad and keyboard that I did it every evening. It’s an oversized useless case now and have to repurchase a new case with keyboard for this School year
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Price, Perfect Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my wife's iPad. She gets so tired of typing on the screen. The Bluetooth connected easy. Its simple to charge, and last for days (as long as she remembers to turn it off when not in use). The keyboard is on par for touch and feel of most keypads. It protects the iPad excellent and is easy to slide into the case. It's about as slim of a profile as most keyboards for iPads. I love the value of Alpatronix gear! and they stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: A very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Alpatronix keyboard for my IPAD 2 an I liked it so well I bought the Kx130 for my IPad Air also. My only wish is I wish all the FN keys were reversed with the SHIFT keys. I just hate having to use BOTH hands to accesss the keyboard and sound controls. I know the keys are bigger which is fine but needing TWO hands to MUTE sound, turn sound UP or DOWN and especially enable the Keyboard it Really Really annoying for me anyway. Am I alone in this view? I wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but clunky
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is a little loose inside the case so the home button doesn't line up well with the opening to allow use of thumb print without wiggling it in place. Otherwise, built like a tank. Keyboard is a little small for bigger hands/fingers, which i expected, but operates well. I have been using the case without carrying around the keyboard and it works well without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to be a nice keyboard and layout was adequate
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a nice keyboard and layout was adequate. However this product was faulty and returned to Amazon for two reasons. 1. Battery would not hold a charge. And 2. Even when constantly plugged in with green charge light the keyboard would not completely (finish) linking with my iPad. Basically useless. This unit was flawed and refunded. I like to think other Alpatronix keyboards work well give its overall rating. But, given my experience I have gone to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Natchmo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for a well made folder
customer_reviews.text: I've used this combination folder for about six months. It is well designed and a good value for the money. My only wish would be that there be a stylus/pencil loop, preferably at the hinge area. Also, I noted that the magnets seem to be a bit weak so that the I-pad does not turn off sometimes which the folder is closed. The keyboard is of decent size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: EMSKI

customer_reviews.title: Solid case with keyboard, would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The case with keyboard is awesome, the keyboard connected right away to my iPad without issues. It gets interesting having two charging cables but then that's cable management not the product. Only reason I gave 4 not 5 stars is the case flap at the end of the keyboard, not shown in the pictures, gets in the way when I'm trying to use it on my lap or a non-hard surface. You tuck it under the keyboard and it raises it up to a funny angle, you leave it out and you can't move the keyboard closer, it's in the way.
customer_reviews.author: CindyK

customer_reviews.title: The case has a nice feel and it is sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Meh. The case has a nice feel and it is sturdy enough. I thought I read that it puts the iPad in sleep mode when it closes, but it doesn't. Maybe I just misread that or I did read it and it doesn't work. The keyboard works nicely but moving it is strange. I was hoping to be able to sit it in my lap and use the keyboard but it doesn't really fit that well. I wish that my old keyboard that I bought when I originally got the iPad at the Verizon store didn't break. If my iPad was brand new I would return this keyboard but it'll be fine for my old one. It is pretty looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Schulman

customer_reviews.title: Great Craftsmanship at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and really impressed with the craftsmanship of this case! Perfect fit for my IPad Air 2, all the cut outs for jacks, camera, etc are perfect, good snug fit and the magnetic keyboard allows me to slide the keyboard to adjust the viewing angle of the screen. I was worried that I would be stuck with a single viewing angle, but sliding the keyboard out does the trick. Keyboard paired immediately and is highly responsive. Very happy with this product's quality and performance so far!
customer_reviews.author: Tofoggin

customer_reviews.title: Great case and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard case! I previously used a regular case without a keyboard but I use my iPad for work and regularly need to write case notes. Having a keyboard has made this so much easier. The keyboard was extremely easy to pair with my iPad. The whole process probably only took 1 minute. The charge is awesome...I charged it before my first use that was about two weeks ago and have not had to charge it yet. I have received quite a few compliments on the case/keyboard. It seems to be better constructed then other versions, even some that are much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of the detachable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with the case. I love that the keyboard has the ability to detach so I can spread out when I want to (ie, put the ipad a further in front of me and have the keyboard near me). The case itself holds up pretty well. It's not a super thin case and there's a space when you cart it around without the keyboard so it doesn't close tightly around your ipad screen. When I know I'm going to be needing a keyboard, I switch to this case, but I have a thin case for "everyday". All in all, I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling, light in weight yet good protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on 9/17 and i received it on 9/21 with free shipping (not the free 2-day Prime Shipping), very happy with the product, leather material is great, keyboard can be easily paired and it works perfectly. It is very good for Traveling for work or other functions, very light in weight yet providing good protection. It cover the entire iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Get product. This is just what I’ve been looking for. It looks great! Sturdy cover with a really comfortable keyboard for typing. My iPad fits perfectly in it. Thanks you for a quick delivery. :)
customer_reviews.author: seabreeze

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Ipad Air that was provided to me from the school where I work. This case/keyboard fits perfectly!! It took me like 30 seconds to set it up. I'm not a fan of typing on the screen so I love this!! If your looking - buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T.

customer_reviews.title: Review:  iPad Air/iPad Pro 9.7 Keyboard + Leather Case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case, although, the hole provided for the charging cable was slightly mislocated and I had to cut it out slightly for access to charge the iPad unit. I would recommend the case though for the quality construction and materials it uses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dresser

customer_reviews.title: I love this leather case for my iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: I love this leather case for my iPad Air. All the cut outs align perfectly and and the case offers full, all-round protection from falls. It lost a star because small deteriorations have already started to affect the case (surface of leather started pealing off) in little spots around the outside of the case in just under one month of usage. However, these are really minimal and not easily noticeable if you don't scrutinize your case in as much detail as I tend to do.
customer_reviews.author: SirK

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and clumsy
customer_reviews.text: This case makes an iPad Air 2 far thicker than my more capable PC laptop. It is awkward to use. The keyboard is somewhat held in place by magnets. It has far too many layers and the flap is in the way. I gave it two stars because it functions and has a nice leathery smell. I wouldn't have purchased it if I had been able to handle it before I bought it. If the keyboard were backlighted, I would give it another star.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Writing papers is so much easier on the go
customer_reviews.text: I’m a freshman in college and this product has helped me so much with writing my papers. I can take my IPad anywhere and type out my reports. The keyboard magnetizes to the case if that’s where you want it or you can remove it completely and use it within 30 feet. The only bad thing about this product is sometimes the keys can be slow when I type so I miss some letters but usually my autocorrect fixes that problem. Overall a very good product. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Doubledutch

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have only wanted a laptop is because I missed the keyboard. This case has everything I want and need (except maybe a mouse). The keys have a nice touch and it’s like having a small laptop. Absolutely no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard and sleek case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my wife's ipad. She uses to track food, enter recipes and read books. It's fantastic. Paired immediately and re-connects super fast as soon as you turn the keyboard back on. Holds a charge for a long time too. She loves the pink color. Great case and the keyboard has a very nice feel to it. A lot like the Apple keyboard I use in terms of the tactile feel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard stopped working in a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Never got around to emailing company. Keyboard stopped working with first couple weeks. Case protects and holds the iPad nicely except for the fingertip login location.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: This seems nice. The leather or synthetic leather (I can’t tell) is quality and the keyboard has nice tactile feedback. I don’t yet know how well it holds a charge and I wish the magnets that hold the keyboard in the case were stronger so I would feel more secure walking around with it ( I am a therapist and use this for documentation during treatment sessions) but it hasn’t fallen off yet. Overall I am pleased with the price and function of this product so far. I will update if I run into problems with more use.
customer_reviews.author: XK

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality, fit and function
customer_reviews.text: Another exceptional product from Alpatronix. Case is a snug fit offering great protection from the accidental drop without adding significent bulk. The keyboard connects quickly and easily and has a good typing feel. Overall the look is very professional and will suit everyone from college student to business professional.
customer_reviews.author: NickB_Carlsbad

customer_reviews.title: The BEST iPad case and keyboard for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product with an even better price. I love everything about it!!! Great quality, professional look and very functional. And the keyboard was fast and easy to install, it has a great deal to it and long battery life. Did I mention the superb price??? I will definitely order more products from Alpatronix.
customer_reviews.author: vince lipiz

customer_reviews.title: The case is very well made and sturdy. It IS pink
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well made and sturdy. It IS pink ... which is ok by me since it stands out and is a little easer to locate. The texture and feel is great and the seams along the edges are sewn and finished nicely. The keyboard is very responsive and has a good tactical feel. It was easy to pair connects immediately when turned on. This is a very good product that i would recommend to anyone looking for a detachable, Bluetooth connected keyboard case.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and keyboard has a good feel
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard was super easy to pair and the case lines up perfectly with my iPad Air 2. I like that the keyboard isn't attached other than with magnets, so you can easily change configurations depending on where you're working. I just got the item, so I can't speak to how long the charge lasts, or how durable the case itself is, but the product out of the box is good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Munro

customer_reviews.title: Better that expectations
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were high when I was looking, and I had my doubts from what I saw out there. This seemed the best choice, so I took a shot. This leather case with keyboard exceeded my expectations, especially for the price. Very well packaged when received, very nice design and construction once opened. keyboard is also leather clad which was unexpected. sticks to leather case magnetically properly. I have no negative feedback. I'm very pleased with the purchase, and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Big and bulky and doesn't stay up right. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.text: The screen doesn't have any way of staying in the upright slot. No magnet or big enough slot to stay in so as you touch the screen , it falls over. Very frustrating. Also, the magnet is't strong enough to hold it closed. The keyboard isn't aligned properly, your hands are to the left and you have to really hit these long keys to type. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case just two months ago and hardly used it, now it doesn't charge. The connection within the case is not working; the cable needs to be held firmly up or down until you find the right spot for a momentary charge...and then you lose it. Without a proper charge the case is useless. Contacted the seller, they sent me an extensive list of questions to answer regarding the problem and requesting that I mail the keyboard in for warranty coverage. Save yourself time and aggravation and purchase a different keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed with it. I have to turn in on and off to get it to connect. The battery doesn’t last long. I would expect it to last a couple of weeks. Mine lasts a couple of days. I hardly use the keypad due to the fact that I have to keep tuning it on and off to get it to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The case fits perfectly. The keyboard is easy to use. I had an issue connecting the keyboard to my i-Pad, contacted customer service and the issue was quickly resolved. I have no complaints and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. The keys don’t seem to be spaced Iike you are used to,but is to be expected when it’s compact. Very responsive, updated for the iPad Air 2 camera hole, and the battery lasts forever. This offers great protection while stored. I wish the keys were backlit, but its not a deal breaker. I replaced my Zagg folio with this and it is a welcome change. Nice that you don’t always have to have the keyboard with you at all times.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Magnets weak, can’t use on lap, case bulky, holes not aligned with iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy case, weak magnets, bulky, not for use in lap...needs tabletop, holes not iPad friendly, good price. The weak magnets and hole misplacement makes this unusable.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for iPad.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, not perfect, but good. Sometimes the switch for the keyboard can get bumped on, and it is not a perfect fit. With that in mind it protects the iPad very well and can be used in several configurations. I liked the product so much that I purchased one for my mother, which I would not have done if I did not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Isn't designed well.
customer_reviews.text: The ipad doesn't stay upright when sitting this on your lap to type. It falls over backward. It slides forward often when sitting at a table or desk with it. It doesn't flip around to make a tent type of stand either. I bought it so I would have it in time for travel and ended up not using it and going to the old case.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: My case of choice for the ipad air
customer_reviews.text: A near-perfect, firmly constructed, light, protective shall for the ipad and accompanying keyboard. Although the keyboard is not permanently affixed to the shell, it stays in place without slipping once the case is in the folded position. My only recommended change involves affixing the keyboard to the case, though I assume it is not done because it is necessary to change the rear-access battery from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: mostlymaimonides

customer_reviews.title: Alpatronix does well.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and received it within 3 days. Packaging was good. It works very well with my iPad Air 2. I have had no problems and highly recommend this keyboard case. You just can't beat the quality for the low price!!
customer_reviews.author: Zool

product_meta.title: iPad Case with Keyboard, 9.7 inch Alpatronix KX130 Leather iPad Cover w/Detachable Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard Compatible w/Apple iPad 6 (2018)/iPad 5 (2017)/iPad Pro 9.7 & iPad Air 2&1-Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackAlpatronix KX130 iPad Premium Synthetic Leather Folio Protective Smart Case with Detachable Bluetooth Wireless QWERTY Keyboard

Compatible with the following Apple iPad models:
iPad Air (Late 2013)
iPad Air 2 (Late 2014)
iPad Pro 9.7-inch (Early 2016)
iPad 5 (Early 2017)
iPad 6 (2018)

Overview:
The KX130 is the smartest addition for your iPad Air 1, 2, iPad Pro 9.7" and iPad 5 (2017) and iPad 6 (2018). An elegant case, the KX130 adds protection, and functionality to your iPad. The exterior is made of premium vegan leather that protects your iPad. The removable keyboard makes typing on the iPad very easy, with a normal layout and larger keys.

Features:
Magnetically folds into a portfolio case protecting your iPad from scratches, stains and splashes.
Easily setup your iPad the first time; afterwards pairing is automatic once the keyboard is turned on.
Comfortable, high quality and natural ABS keys provide a quick response and natural typing experience.
Bluetooth keyboard can used with other Bluetooth-enabled devices.
Auto wake and sleep function.
Special keys for brightness, home, screen lock, volume and playback controls.
Turn your iPad into an ultra portable laptop.
For extra portability, remove the magnetic keyboard to use the case on its own to hold files and folders.

Specifications:
Bluetooth 3.0
ABS chiclet keyboard (higher quality than silicone keys)
Operating Distance: 30 ft.
Working Time: 100+ hrs.
Standby Time: 800+ hrs.
Charging Time: 1-2 hrs.

What's in the Box? (Retail Packaging):
1x Folio Smartcase
1x Removable Bluetooth Wireless Keyboard
1x micro USB cable
1x User Manual
feature_bullets: [FOLIO STYLE iPAD CASE & WIRELESS KEYBOARD W/ FULL SIZE KEYS]: A smart iPad case that acts as a portfolio or padfolio tablet holder and stand. Perfect for school college business/home. No need for a mouse as the iPad screen is touch-responsive. In all aspects this hard case transforms your i Pad into a laptop computer. The keyboard may be small but the efficient layout allows for large chiclet-style keys similar to Apple or other full-sized keyboard.

[ELEGANT & PORTABLE YET EXTREMELY DURABLE]: This iPad case looks classy & official yet it’s rugged enough to be used in thousands of classrooms nationwide. The long-lasting battery supports 120+ hours of typing & 850+ hours of standby time. The wireless keyboards is magnetic and removeable so you can use it as a slim case and quickly snap it back in to avoid using the iPad soft keys. Perfect iPad tablet stand that quickly pairs & has no lag or delay in typing speed.

[Maximum Utility & Portability]: An iPad case with keyboard is the best iPad accessory. The wireless keyboard is magnetic & removeable: use as a slim case and easily snap it back if needed. Replacement for iPad softkeys allows fast typing w/ no lag / delay makes it the best iPad holder stand with keyboard. Unlike most iPad bluetooth keyboard this iPad cover has full-size keys for comfortable typing. Pairs w/ any bluetooth device such as iPhone/iPad/MacBook Pro or smartphone.

[SO MANY POSSIBILITIES]: Whether looking for an iPad case for kids, versatile travel accessories or an iPad keyboard case for students/business professionals this is the perfect find. Use it as a keyboard stand for fast typing turn it into an iPad holder stand for web browsing. Easily adjust the screen angle of this iPad holder for viewing movies / doing work. The protector case fits iPad 6th generation (2018, iPad 5th gen (2017), iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Air 2, and iPad Air 1.

[WHY BUY THIS CASE?]: We are a California family-owned & operated company & design all products in USA w/ customer service staff here in the US of A. This portable keyboard comes w/ highest level of safety standards & 1-year warranty (can be doubled at no charge). [COMPATIBLE W/ i Pad 6, iPad 5th generation, Pro 9.7, and iPad Air 2/1 ONLY]: not an iPad mini case or iPad Pro 12-inch case. Visit our Amazon store for a full line of other bluetooth keyboards & other products.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,817 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
